Definition.WordDefinition: americium Symbol: Am Atomic number: 95 Atomic weight: (243) Radioactive metallic transuranic element, belongs to the actinoids. Ten known isotopes. Am-243 is the most stable isotope, with a half-life of 7.95*10^3 years. Discovered by Glenn T. Seaborg and associates in 1945, it was obtained by bombarding {uranium}-238 with alpha particles.
americium n : a radioactive transuranic metallic element; discovered by bombarding uranium with helium atoms [syn: {Am}, {atomic number 95}]
